item.title: Samantha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description:
"But love is always new. Regardless of whether we love once, twice, or a dozen times in our life, we always face a brand-new situation. Love can consign us to hell or to paradise, but it always takes us somewhere. We simply have to accept it, because it is what nourishes our existence. If we reject it, we die of hunger, because we lack the courage to stretch out a hand and pluck the fruit from the branches of the tree of life. We have to take love where we find it, even if that means hours, days, weeks of disappointment and sadness.
The moment we begin to seek love, love begins to seek us. And to save us." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I wouldn't change it," Simon said. "I wouldn't give up loving you. Not for anything. You know what Raphael told me? That I didn't know how to be a good vampire, that vampires accept that they're dead. But as long as I remember what it was like to love you, I'll always feel like I'm alive." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "But-" Maia, still looking at Alec and Magnus, broke off and rasied her eyebrows. Simon turned to see what she was looking at - and stared. Alec had his arms around Magnus and was kissing him full on the mouth. Magnus, who appeared to be in a state of shock, stood frozen. Several groups of people - Shadowhunters and Downworlders alike - were staring and whispering. Glancing to the side, Simon saw the Lightwoods, their eyes widen, gaping at the display. Maryse had her hand over her mouth. Maia looked perplexed. "Wait a second," she said. "Do we all have to do that, too?" -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Mom. I have something to tell you. I’m undead. Now, I know you may have some preconceived notions about the undead. I know you may not be comfortable with the idea of me being undead. But I’m here to tell you that undead are just like you and me … well, okay. Possibly more like me than you." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "Fear is the cheapest room in the house. I would like to see you living In better conditions." -- Hafiz

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Samantha add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Samantha add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Samantha add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The mind is not a book, to be opened at will and examined at leisure. Thoughts are not etched on the inside of skulls, to be perused by an invader. The mind is a complex and many-layered thing." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Samantha add a quote by J. K. Rowling
item.description: "The thing about growing up with Fred and George," said Ginny thoughtfully, "is that you sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve." -- J. K. Rowling

item.title: Samantha add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Samantha add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "You're never given a dream without also being given the power to make it true." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?" -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life. Rarely do members of one family grow up under the same roof." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "That’s what learning is, after all; not whether we lose the game, but how we lose and how we’ve changed because of it, and what we take away from it that we never had before, to apply to other games. Losing, in a curious way is winning." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Bad things are not the worst things that an happen to us. NOTHING is the worst thing that can happen to us." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Your friends will know you better in the first minute you meet than your acquaintances will know you in a thousand years." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "In order to live free and happily, you must sacrifice boredom. It is not always an easy choice." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "What about everybody else Pye? How many lives can there be in one universe?'[...] 'How many lives Richard?'[...]'One.'." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Hakim Sanai
item.description: "If knowledge does not liberate the self from the self, then ignorance is better than such knowledge." -- Hakim Sanai

item.title: Samantha add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "So light a fire!" Harry choked. "Yes...of course...but there's no wood!" ... "HAVE YOU GONE MAD!" Ron bellowed. "ARE YOU A WITCH OR NOT!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "People aren't born good or bad. Maybe they're born with tendencies either way, but its the way you live your life that matters." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a badass, and I recognize that you, too, are a badass." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Cassandra Clare
